profile.name: Charlie Flux
profile.personalDescription: Charlie may appear to be accomplishing things, but much of it is due to chance.

profile.name: Arthur Clarke
profile.personalDescription:
Arthur is an 18 year old video games enthusiast, perfectionist and enjoys coding. 
He is gifted with the Sight, cannot be killed with conventional weapons, and should not be allowed to write short bios about himself.

profile.name: Lily Young
profile.personalDescription: Lily is 19 years old. She likes people, places and things.
